ingredients.item: 2 tbsp olive oil, plus extra for drizzling
pinch chilli flakes, plus extra to serve
3 large potatoes, peeled and cut into 2cm pieces
1 litre Cooks’ Ingredients fresh chicken (or vegetable) stock
½ savoy cabbage, quartered, tough stalks removed, shredded

instructions.step: Heat the oil in a large saucepan. Add the onion, garlic, chilli and bay leaves, then sweat over a low-medium heat for 15-20 minutes until soft and tinged golden.

Add the potatoes and cook for 2 minutes before adding the stock. Bring to the boil, then simmer for 20 minutes until the potatoes are tender. Stir in the cabbage; simmer for 6-7 minutes until just cooked. Serve in bowls with a drizzle of olive oil and extra chilli flakes, if liked.
